content.detailedDescription: It was about 4am when a friend of mine woke me up talking hysterically about this thing in the sky, something i had to see. so i got up and walked outside. at first, it looked like the north star. as i became more aware of what was going on i realized that it was much bigger and to close to be a star. it was so bright and close to the water that it made a reflection in the water like the moon would but the moon was not out that night. i watched for maybe 30min to and hour and i had to go back to bed to so i could work that morning. my friend and two others stayed up till the sun came up and he said it stayed out the remainder of the night and continued to move in small circles or up and down slightly. it was off of cresent beach maybe a couple miles off shore.
content.summary: Extreamly bright light

content.detailedDescription:
Malaysia star newspaper 18oct95 color (and timed b&w) photos & journalist & many witnesses of 3-mile-wide whole-body glowing yellow typical flying-saucer (with th hovered many nights at kampung tanjung sepat forest, near the yet-to-be-built currently klia (kuala lumpur international airport).

i have the original newspaper clippings. interesting that village folks had seen "pillars of light" in the forest. so aborigines (orang-asli) claimed to have been kidnapped. village folk had seen the undercarraige of the huge craft as it flew overhead inthe day time.

mutual ufo network walter-andrus is quoted in the newspaper reports.

these are my cell-phone photos of the newspaper, my scanner is kaput, so i could not do a nice high-re for u. later will try.

i never saw the ufo, i just have the newspaper-clippings since i am surprised that this clear ufo incident is not listed at wikipedia or 

http://news.Yahoo.Com/s/afp/20070918/sc_afp/peruhealthoffbeat

http://www.Alienationsam.Com/historic_ufo/index.Html (ufo)

please investigate.
content.summary: Malaysia star newspaper 18oct95 color (and timed b&w) photos & journalist witnesses of 3-mile-wide whole-body glowing yellow typical flying-saucer hovered many nights at kampung tanjung sepat
content.locationName: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting happened in melbourne, australia...

there are a few funny things about this experience that i marvel about. it was not so much visually stunning as it was amazing and 'cute'.

it was getting late in the night sometime before midnight, around 10pm and my sister's birthday party had just wound down and the last few people had left. i was sitting in the living room thinking about closing the balcony door. i got up and leaned over to release the door stopper when out the corner of my eye i saw a streak of light fly through the night sky. it was quite a distance away and i thought it was a shooting star. quickly i turned my head to make sure i didn't miss it as i love seeing heavenly bodies fly through the sky, when suddenly this light had come to an instantaneous halt! then before i could get my wits about me this light started moving backward and forwards at an amazing speed. judging by the distance (the light seemed to be out of earth's atmosphere) this light would of probably been covering a phenomonal area in no time as it danced back and forth.

i stood there not knowing what to make of it. it's brightness was more intense than any other visible star in the sky and it was back dropped by the moon. i live in the city and the stars are not very bright where i am so this light stood out.

it was only about 5 seconds or so of this light dancing backwards and forwards almost as if it was waving, then suddenly it zooms off at ligthning speed and vanished right before my eyes.

i stood there for a while in denial of what just happened, not able to make sense of it. my mind was trying to be logical but my memory and emotions were telling a very different story.

it occurred to me in the following days that this had happened on the night of my sister's 16th birthday. to me i will never forget that date further more. i thought that it was uncanny that i happened to see it just as i stepped out onto the balcony. what was the chances of that? if this craft did not want to be seen by me then why did it dance before zooming off? why did it wait for me to go out on the balcony? was the date significant? or just a way for me to remember when it happened?

i don't know the answers to this but it does feel good to think that there was no accident that this event took place.
content.summary: Dancing light in night sky then suddenly vanish...

content.detailedDescription:
I have noticed a couple of "stars" that i had never seen in the night sky before for the past couple of months.  two nights ago i went out to this lake with my friend and we we're sitting watching these two "stars" moving back and forth, zigging and zagging every which way, when all of a sudden another bright light that i had never seen before made its way up and left in the most irregular flight path i had ever seen.  as it seemed to be getting closer, i turned to my friend and said "if at any time you want to leave, we can leave." as it moved closer towards us the lights just blinked out and for only a second the craft was lost.  we picked it pack up because it had 3 flashing red lights on the front and a cluster in the back.  it moved effortlessly and without sound across the night sky and out of view behind the trees.  the minute we lost sight of the craft, i freaked out and rushed the both of us to the car and left.  this silent craft was the first time i had seen anything like it and that night was the first night i had ever seen it.  the two other stars have been in a general location for a couple months now.  

if you are interested in the things i have seen, please feel free to contact me via e-mail.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I left where i was because i freaked out.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out in our backyard placing flagstones for a patio. i felt a few drops of rain and looked up to find the cloud it came from. there were no clouds and  sky was completely clear except for a large white contrail directly over head. i thought it was curious we were getting rain without an obvious source, (it was also completely windless, so no odd sprinkles from a nearby water sprinkler seemed likely.) 

the contrail was interesting,though,  so i went inside to get our big field glasses to take a better look. when i focused the binocs i found the contrail immediately and was surprised at how different it looked from naked-eye viewing--very iridescent and pinkish. it was startling so i put down the glasses to check if i was looking at the same contrail. i was, of course, and when i put the glasses back up to my eyes, i saw a (non luminous) bright red sphere floating just above the edge of the contrail. compared to the contrail, it must have been about volkswagen sized.

 i really was not expecting that, and quickly put the glasses down to check the sky for a balloon, since that was the thing it most closely resembled, although i've never seen such a perfectly round ballooon before. however, i couldn't see anything like that near the contrail. i put the glasses back up and saw that the red sphere had been joined by a yellow sphere. when i looked closely i saw they had dark areas at the bottom of each sphere where some appendages or pipes or something were silhouetted, too dark to make out clearly. the two spheres flew in and out of the contrail vapors for a moment as i tried to steady the glasses and called out for my husband to come look. by the time my husband came over the contrail and everything else was gone. i searched the sky with the field glasses and naked eye, but there was no more spheres or vapor. i looked and looked for a red and yellow balloon afterwards, hoping that prove the sighting was nothing anomalous. i certainly wanted it to be just something ordinary like a balloon. but there was nothing.

the sighting lasted only a few seconds, unfortunately. i don't think i've ever seen a contrail disappear that quickly before. and i wonder if it had anything to do with the "raindrops" i felt and saw land on the flagstones just before the sighting.  it was unnerving. 

i was in civil air patrol as a teenager, and those spheres didn't look like any standard aircraft type i know. it was pretty disturbing--
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 volkswagen-sized  colored spheres flying around and inside  contrail altitude about 3500 feet

content.detailedDescription: I received a call from a friend about a small but brite flashing white, green, red light in lower northeastern sky at 9:45 pm still slowly moving after an hour. i videoed 2 ufo sighting in oct 2004 & was on radio (coast to coast am with george noorey) with sam maranto about this in jan 07. i can't determine if it's some kind of star but it's not acting like one as it is clearer & the flashing is brighter than other visible stars in sky & colors are very visible. i have taken film shots at various camera settings (manual 35mm camera.) i'm going back out to see if it's still there. i suspect that what i may be seeing is a planet but i can't find a website to confirm it. please send to me sam moranto's current email address & phone number as i would like to contact him again about previous tinley sightings & a tv show that i would like to produce about the phenomenon. (i have a first cousin with big time connections in hollywood)don wilkinson 708 979 4521 or 708 535 3656 thanks
content.summary: In northeastern sky flashing light moving slowly seen by friend in tinley too

content.detailedDescription: First let me say i am very sane, own a business and very much a realist, but know strange things happen and i am more than intelligent to differentiate lights, planes, flares, jets, helicopters, comets etc..  in manhattan, it is very infrequent we have clear skies and i have 20/20 vision so i can see much better than my counterparts at night.. in this case, you did not need 20/20 vision.  i was living in a 3000sf loft in soho (downtown manhattan) having a when i had this feeling to go look out the window ( which are 10 foot high windows).  i started looking up at the night sky and saw stars were visible and said wow ..I stead-fastly glanced around to see how many i could see, eventually i saw two faint stars that looked too close together, so i focused my view towards them...(i admit i am curious about our skies) it seemed odd two stars could be that close..After a minute of concentrating my attention to them.. unbelievably... this bright light appeared out of nowhere!!  it looked as if it was a few hundred feet above the building and soho has 6-8 story low buildings.  it appeared instantaneously out of the dark, very bright, motionless, shape and size was like the circles you fill in on an sat exam, no more than 5 seconds after it had become visible and i could finally finish utterring "what the ...." it darted off so tremendously fast that i screamed so loud to my girlfriend to come.  my heart was beating so fast and i cursed myself for not having a camcorder handy.  no noise, no smoke, nothing.  we jumped out onto the fire escape to see if it would return...Nothing, i would have stayed looking but clouds just moved in very quickly and covered the skies completely...Strange?  the reason this night was odd; i very rarely looked out those windows before and it was 2ish in the morning on a sunday and we were just relaxing.  i had the urge to go look out into the sky and why did i focus in that direction and exactly where i was looking, this occurred as if i was supposed to see it.  i have not been the same since - i have always believed we are not alone, but never seen anything remotely close to that night and that was no ordinary, explainable occurrence.  (i'm not religious) so unless god was doing a magic trick for me, that was the number one unexplainable thing i have ever witnessed.  i called everyone that same night/morning that's quite a few people; they all believed me, a few even mentioned they have seen plenty of things in the sky similar in their countries as their nights are much clearer than ours, one even laughed and told me, come to my country and you will see something is happening in the skies that we are not being told.  my friends are from all over - israel, peru, ecquador, brazil, england etc.. next day and after that, i was researching everything, every website, current stories, ufo sites, recent news etc... to see if anyone saw or reported the same or similar.  nothing, however, strange things started happening after that - i won't mention so people start thinking i'm nutty - one thing i will mention is 3 nights after, a helicopter was flying continuously directly over my building/area for approx. 30 minutes between 3-4am in the morning.  that was extremely unusual in this very quiet neighborhood..In manhattan period! especially at that time of morning.  i figured it had to be military in type due to the very loud sound of the roters. i looked out and up and i could see only the shape, but also three bright large square lights under it.  i didn't know helicopters had huge lights like that underneath them, they were not search lights, more like the bottom of the helicopter.   i have since gone and bought a serious camcorder with night vision and infrared with extended magnification.  i am now fully equipped ..Sorry for the long story, but i have not been the same and i don't like not knowing, especially after what i saw.
content.summary: Bright circle appeared out of no where in night sky then jetted off in the blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
I'll begin by stating that the time being in the evening, the sun was down and the moonlight was negligible.  i had a minor amount of white noise inside of my house at the time of the sighting, other light sources being an incandescent light behind me and the monitor on my desk.

at the time of the sighting, i was working at my computer, situated in the corner of a room with a very large window to my right side, giving me full view of the sky.  there are trees around my house, some fairly tall in the 50-75 foot range; this being in january, there were no leaves on any of the trees and the branches were small enough to not obscure my vision.

out of the corner of my right eye, i saw some lights heading directly toward my house, flying somewhere in the range of 30-50 feet off of the ground.  the lights being so low was the first thing to catch my attention, and immediately after that the realization that i did not, hear any sound being emitted from this object, regardless of its extremely low altitude.

there is a decent amount of air traffic around this area, usually national guard helicopters and some small to mid-sized airplanes, all of which i can clearly hear from 800+ meters away.

the object maintained a constant speed of approximately 25-30 miles per hour and did not change course for as long as i watched.  

the lack of light worked against me as i was unable to make out any outline on the object; there were four circular lights that i saw; two spaced in the front and two more off to a 45-degree angle behind the first two.  the object did not rotate at all, moving much like a fixed-wing craft.

i consider myself a fairly smart person, but this absolutely boggled my mind; the rate of speed, the lack of noise and the low altitude all kind of hit me at once.  i was, for a lack of a better term, stunned; in my right mind, i would have either told my father, who was in the other room, to look out the window or ran out my front door to see where it went next.  

regrettably, though, i sat in a state that i can only describe as stunned, processing what i had just seen.
content.summary: Extremely slow & low-flying object over salem, or.

content.detailedDescription:
This object had the appearance of a rotating rectangle and either over or very close to an airport and in the pathway of oncoming air traffic. the observation occurred around 4 p.M. on february 23, 1984 over hamilton hall on the ohio state university campus in columbus, ohio. when the first witness, w1, sighted the object, from a stairwell under an east-facing window, it looked, in general, like a flying, rotating rectangle. part of the time it had a bright light under it. it moved slowly, was on the flight path of port columbus airport, and a low jet appeared to pass under it as w1 watched. w1 went to the department office and collected 4 other witnesses.

in general, it looked like a rectangle, which would disappear and then come back into view. during part of the observation, a much smaller, but very bright white light was under the rectangle. the object rotated at precise regular intervals of about once a minute. it didn���t just twist randomly in the wind. 

the witnesses watched it for approximately 20-25 minutes as, it slowly drifted toward port columbus airport. the witnesses asked if there were a telescope or camera in the building, but were unable to find one. by around 4:20, a witness called warren nicholson, who worked at the nearby battelle memorial institute and who investigates ufo sightings. by this time, the object was nearly out of sight. mr. nicholson called back to say that he had looked for it from the roof of the main battelle building, but had been unable to see it. he later said that he had checked with port columbus immediately and they told him the wind velocity was 0. they couldn���t see it on radar.

mr. nicholson later said that that evening a family had also made a ufo report describing it as four lines in the sky. the father had taken pictures through a 1200 power telephoto lens with asa 400 color film. the wife described the lines as tear drop shaped and the husband described each as shaped like an airplane���s wing section. they were visible in the west and were dark. they then flew away in four different directions. mr. nicholson said the witnesses were very credible. he thought that many sightings in one day were a ���flurry��� of activity.

so far, the object has never been identified. one characteristic noted by all witnesses was its regular rotation and rectangular appearance. no balloon shape was seen. it would be quite difficult for a balloon to continually rotate regularly, because wind currents would prevent this. the rotation was very regular, not a twisting in the wind (and there was no wind). in addition, there would need to be some sort of power plant and a method of propulsion to allow it to maintain its rotation.

this sighting was in some ways similar to the november 2006 sighting over o���hare in that it was near an airport, where an airplane could have struck the object. as in the o���hare observation, all witness was credible. all now have ph.D.S and have been or are university professors. the reports were collected from each individual witness independently within a few days of the sighting. the observation was reported in several books.
content.summary: Rotating rectangular object viewed in airport glide slope for 20 minutes by highly credible witnesses

content.detailedDescription: My family and i went outside and saw bright lights in the sky. but the object was just hovering and not moving like other planes in the sky. we got our binoculars and telescope and got a close up of the object. and it was disc shaped with bright, red, green, yellow lights circling around the edge of it; it looked like. we saw it the past two nights in a row around the same time. it is in the western sky of long island. if anyone else saw this object. please post it. thank you.
content.summary: Bright lights circling object

content.detailedDescription:
I walk my dogs every night and look for, what i think, are falling stars...Which i see and recognize/ i.E. faint light, speed, angle etc/  ....What i saw two nights ago was not falling stars, airplanes, or meteors.   it was two starlike lights...Moving simultaniously.  it was south east to west.   i would not have thought ufo, but adding up the specifics left it an obvious possibility.  specifics are:   the fast flickering speed, the traveling speed, the time and duration of this event and then the abrupt disappearance. 

what do you think?

by the way aug. 11 2007 i also saw something....I thought it was a comet, but now am not sure.  i was not like any of the comet photos on the hubblesite  or in other similar gallerys.  this huge ball in the sky came down towards this area with a fat short blue firey tail....I say short because the comet pictures i've seen have really long tails.   i thought it hit the earth..Seemingly close to me...Driving distance even....About 45 minutes.
....I thought my life had changed, having witnessed this event.  i expected news of  a fire and that night looked for signs of a fire...But nothing...

so, what was that?    the tail was really bright blue...?  is that recognizable ? 

in a hurry.
.. sorry about spelling and grammatically errors.
thank you.
content.summary: 2 flickering lights that move right to left/then stop/then vanish

content.detailedDescription: The star like object was at least ten times the brightness of the planet venus with a duration lasting for an hour and 15 minutes. the object first appeared to be 45 degrees above the eastern horizon then eventually slowly moved slightly south to a point 70 degrees above eastern horizon, appearing to move above a radio tower.
content.summary: Star more than x10 the brightness of venus

content.detailedDescription:
[note: i also put this in my web space - ask for the address.]

driving out of town, going for one last stop. it's about 16:50 - the sun had already set behind the mountains. noticed a bright patch of white in the darkening sky - too big for venus, not quite as bright. could be a very bright small cloud, but other clouds are drifting and this one isn't. at a parking lot, i braced my binoculars solidly, and determined the object was stationary for about 1/2 hour. i asked another person to look and tell me what he saw - it was the same. the object was about 25 degrees above the southern horizon, about 4x the size of venus, and overall brightness roughly that of jupiter - to the naked eye. there were no clouds near it, but cirrus clouds were approaching from the west.

no camera, so i memorized all i could, and later drew a picture. when i was a kid, i saw one that was all action and no detail. this was the opposite. i'm glad, because i'm tired of pictures of blobs and specks. this drawing is large (~ 1 mb) - if you zoom in, you will see my attempts to represent the following impressions. feel free to copy the drawing; just don't alter it in any way, and don't represent it as an actual photograph. while the shape and placement of the object's features is reasonably accurate, my drawing cannot do it justice.

it looked like a glowing diamond filled with countless strands of yellow-white light, each strand a string of countless beads of gleaming white, all of which floated in a transparent medium which permitted the sky color to pass through yet also glowed faintly due to its contents. it brought to mind one of those spectacular back-lit pictures of a live jellyfish by national geographic. the brightness of the "corners" was more like that of venus, but the interior was of lesser intensity.

as the clouds began to pass #under# it, i knew it was pretty high up, pretty big, and not attached to a tether. as the clouds began to obscure it, it's light gradually changed from yellow-white to intense crimson, although the corners remained white. therefore i thought the object might be reflective, rather than self-luminous - we get new mexico sunsets. however, after it was obscured for a while and the sky was getting dark, the clouds thinned and the object was a faintly visible, yellow-white glow.

object made no sound.

-end-
content.summary: Diamond object south of durango co 2007/09/13

content.detailedDescription:
My 16 year old son brought a strange light in the sky to my attention around 9:15pm on 09/09/07. we live on a very 

high part of hudson, wisconsin and have a view of the western horizon. we live right on the border of wisconsin and 

minnesota and the mississippi river is the divide. the msp international airport is 30 miles away, slightly to the 

left of our backyard view, so airplane sightings in the sky are constant. we have lived in the house for almost 3 

years and know what airplanes look like very well, far away, close-up, the paths they took...
this particular night, what we saw wasn't like anything i had ever seen!
 my son was yelling to hurry and check it out, i walked out the deck door and looked straight out and saw this huge 

ball of light, flashing colors of light very fast! red, blue, yellow, white, orange, very low to the ground and 

very close. close, meaning that it looked like it was right above the river which is 11 blocks to the west down the 

hill. the light was flashing at a phenomenal speed, very very bright! it hovered there in the same spot for what 

seemed like 15-20 minutes. as this one hovered it was joined by another similar light, except this one was much 

smaller, the smaller one was only there for a couple of minutes and departed, first upwards and then to the south. 

my son and i were so in awe, we didn't think about the camera until several minutes passed. when we finally got the 

camera it was on its last bit of juice and the battery was dying, we were able to snap 4 pictures, but the quality 

isn't good considering it was dark and trying to set up the camera before it died completely. the light faded and 

departed steadily to the south. it was over by 9:30pm.
 the next day my head was still abuzz from what i had seen and i charged the camera so that in case they returned 

that night, i would be ready. around 9:00 pm that night on 09/10/07 they returned...This time further away, but the 

same exact scenario. they were closer to the airport and over in that direction. the main bigger light hovered 

again for about 15-20 minutes. this night it was joined by 2 other lights, smaller, they didn't stay very long and 

departed south. between myself and my 2 other sons we snapped around 100 pictures that night, the pics are amazing, 

they don't depict what we seen with our human eye, instead they have an orb shape or round.
 we have continued to see these lights every night this week and if we sit out on the deck from 8pm to 10pm, they 

keep coming back. it is very unsettling and my thoughts of ufos have consumed my whole week! 
 they seem to be silent, no sound coming from them, although last night, which was 09/14, as i was trying to 

capture 2 lights in the sky, that were very bright, i heard a low humming/buzzing noise, almost like electricity 

would sound? but not really like anything i had heard before.(except on "alien" movies...) it lasted for about 5 

seconds and stopped, i recorded the noise on video, but was not able to capture the two lights in the sky, due to a 

big tree in our yard.  i've looked on the internet and it doesn't look like anyone else besides us, have seen these 

lights. tonight 09/15, we are going to drive to a lookout spot in our town on top of a cliff, thinking about buying 

a telescope!!


shelly
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange lights in the sky, every night for almost a week!

content.detailedDescription: At about 12am my boyfriend called me outside because he saw a star like object that didn't sem quite right to him. it appeared to have a tail and was moving in a small loop. it was brighter than a star and had a reddish tint to it, sometimes blue.. it appeared to be bouncing off of the atmosphere, we thought it could be a comet or something, possibly headed into the atmoshere. another thought was that it could be an alien-craft or perhaps an icbm missile. about 45 min. later i spotted a second one. it was moving much slower but doing the same thing..
content.summary: 2 star like objects. twinkling brighter and faster than stars. doing barely noticable loops. they appeared to be bouncing off of the atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfreind an i were traveling from waterloo station to wimbledon station at about 4:30pm.

the weather was warm and sunny, clear skies with few low altitude "thin" clouds.
we were nearing clapham junction station, i was sitting beside the window with my back to the direction of travel (seats face both ways on the trains here). i saw about 7 silver/white orbs in the sky well below the current cloud level. i turned to my girlfreind and showed her. we decided to get off at the station and take our time to look at this as we thought it was extremely strange.

we had a better view from the platform. there were about 18 orbs that i counted moving quite slowly in the direction from where we came. some of the orbs were moving up, some moving down but all were "together" in the same area. another thing i noticed was that there was one bigger than the rest and was moving very closely with another smaller one. 

i had my hasselblad 503cw film camera with me today. (semi professional photographer)
it is loaded with 100asa b/w kodak 120 roll film, i took 6 shots of the orbs with a 150mm lens.
the aperture was set at f16, 125th/second and focus to infinity. the film is still in the camera right now and is not yet developed. i managed to get a lamp post in the shot for "reference"

the orbs were about 200-300meters high all moving in the same direction. i would have to guess their size to be about 1-2meter in diameter each. each was moving independantly, some up, some down at varying degrees. they were not rising to higher altitude but rather along the same plane of altitude. we watched for about ten minute and boarded another train to wimbledon. they were still visible yet further away.

thats it for now, will get the film developed and see.
content.summary: Travelling on a train and saw +-7 orbs in the sky, got off at next station (better view, there were about 18 of them) and proceeded to photograph.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sirs,this tape i recorded for very limited time when i was goining to my work at cairo international airport at year 2001 before i retired at 2005 as airlines senior officer,i always have my panasonic video camera ,but i was not have it's stable stand in my car in addition i had no time to record more that ufo , i noticed that object in the sky and between the buildings like a solo big glowing star,so i stopped for a while to caught this chance specialy in area very near to the airport about distance of 8 km only.Thanks
dr.Ibrahim
egyptian ufologist
www.Ufo-egyptian-hunter.Org
content.summary: This is dr.Ibrahim.....Www.Ufo-egyptian-hunter.Org.....This is the total tape recorded and the tape was miss placed with the big quintity of recorded tapes which recorded by me personally.It was recorded without stable stand .Thanks

content.detailedDescription: I was driving tonight at the specific time listed, 9:12 pm. i could not judge the direction. it moved towards the mountain range (franklin mountains). very fast, very bright, on the larger side, since i could see it through the city lights. the sky was clear. it may have not been a ufo, but i cannot identify it. i had no particular feelings at the time. i work as a delivery driver, and was returning from a delivery from ft. bliss, coming across the bridge from the gate. when i saw the object, i remembered to write down the time when i next stopped. i am not sure if anyone else noticed it.
content.summary: Possibly a falling piece of debris or "shooting star"

content.detailedDescription: Two friends and i were camping along the coast just south of shelter cove. we stayed at the sinkyou state park, a place called bear harbor. around 10pm one of my friends went to sleep and my buddy jeff and i started lookin at the stars. theres almost no out side light up there along the lost coast. i remeber checking my watch around 10:00 -10:15 or so and not long after that we saw a satelite go over. we were scanning the sky for shooting stars when we noticed a wierd strobe light type of flash, it was way off the coast headed right for our campsite. as it got to the coast it turned right along the coast and i was able to see the three tringle lights along the bottom. it did seem to move much quicker through the sky then a plane flying that far away. earlier in the day a plane and a jet flew over a good ways away and the sound was so out of place in that natural enviroment. the craft that flew over that night was totally silent. as it continued down the coast it apeared another one joined it in formation and they headed down the coast. it was only about 1 min to 1.5 minutes long and she was way down the coast, no sound whats so ever....Totally silent. the only thing that grabbed my attention was the strobe. i've lived around a couple major airforce bases for many years and have never seen a military running light like that. there was no red or white solid lights, just three yellowish triangles and the wierd strobe lights in a sorta w with wings patern. it happened so fast, i kept saying jeff whats that, what the h#ll is that. i tryed to wake my friend steve but he did not respond. a very interesting night....
content.summary: Tringle shape three lights and wierd strobe light ,

content.detailedDescription: Event took place in the same (n) sky that i have witnessed these lights in on many occasions.  tonight they were filling the sky with dozens of strobes--placed too close together to be aircraft and far apart enough to signify something large, judging by their distance.  every once in awhile, maybe 20 minutes or so, one would go from being a strobe, to a bright star which would hover or navigate around.  these bright stars would then "bloom", as i have read in other accounts, into a bright flare  which lasts a few seconds (5-10) on this night there was a flare that started at the top, then as soon as it went out another came on immediately below it and to the left, and then another below and to the left and another and another.  all together there were four that progressed down in a fairly evenly timed and spaced sequence in a diagonal line.  video of decent quality was made of the event and i am working on editing it down.
content.summary: Same type of sighting as described on 9/11/07, lots of twinkling strobes, sometimes turning into folden orange fiery orbs.
3 separate lights, 1 red, 1 green, 1 amber, at first clustered, then separated. what empressed  the witness was the eradic manauvers & then stop still & hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to go out to eat on september 12, 2007. i was headed west on illinois 13 when i noticed an object in the sky. it was still daylight but the object was shining very brightly, almost like a really bright star. i thought at first it must be a plane headed straight towards my direction and i was seeing it's headlight. then i thought maybe the sun was reflecting off of a plane and thats why it was so bright. but then to the north were two jets and even though they were silver they did not reflect like this object did.
i kept watching and drove about 3 miles directly towards the object. it did not move, it didn't get closer farther away, it just stayed in the same spot. i noticed the two jets had already traveled a great distance from where i had first seen them and thought it strange that this object was still in the same place as when i first noticed it.
suddenly the object became even brighter and the only way i can describe it is it was "glowing" then it became dimmer and dimmer till it vanished from sight. it still hadn't moved at all. it just got dimmer till i couldn't see it anymore.
i then noticed that another one appeared right when the first one vanished (same one maybe??) it was much farther away and lower in the sky. i don't know what happened with that one because by this time i had came to my turn and lost sight of it. 
the first one seemed to be about the size of a nickel from arms length. the second one was smaller when it appeared but was just as bright. both objects appeared to be perfect circles.
content.summary: Very bright white object in western sky

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of august 16th, 2007, while staying at our camp in priceville, new brunswick, canada, myself and three (3) other individuals witnessed a very unusual sight in the north-west star-filled sky.  our camp has no electricity, the closest home with electricity is approximately 1/4 -1/2 mile away.  we at first thought the object was a very bright star, until the object began to move, in both vertical and horizontal movements.  our next thought was that the object may be part of the spacestation, or the orbit of the flight visiting the station at that time.  the area of the sighting is in the direct flight route of all aircraft using canadian air-space enroute to europe and other locations.  we have seen many such aircraft and satellites over the years we have visited our camp (over 40 years), and we recognize the difference between a star, satellite, or airplane.  this, most definately, was something different.  when approaching aircraft came into sight, the object would dim and disappear, only to reappear, following the disappearance of the aircraft.  it continued to "bob" up and down, and with short quick movements to the left and right.  otherwise, it stayed in relatively the same spot.  we were fascinated with the object, and marveled at its movements.  we were not afraid or aprehensive.  we have seen many signts in the skies above and around our camp.  we continued to observe for about 15 minutes, then went into our camp for the night.  we did not lose signt of the object.  there was nothing more to do so we went into our camp.We watched for the object each night thereafter and did not witness it again until the night of september 5th, 2007, located in the same space, but seen approximately around 10:00 p.M.

would there possibly be some answer to this viewing other than a ufo?  i would like to hear from anyone who can respond to such a request.

my husband, who was also a witness to this, and i will be returning to our camp in new brunswick next week again (we reside in lewiston, maine, usa on a permanent basis).  thank you, marina f. fossett
content.summary: Bright moving object in the north-west sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking towards the southwest ( the spokane area )toward the horizon after the sunset.  i didn't see it in tell it light up then it fell about five hundred feet ( very bright ) slowed as it fell, then flashed out.  i watched the area it fell for about an hour ( there were radio towers in the area it fell ) and all the while there were small lights ( very dim but visable ) shooting off about every five to eight minutes. 

thats all i saw, but this was no falling star or rock it had a controlled desent but it happened so fast i couldn't take a picture( the story of my life ).
content.summary: Round, bright, none streeking.  there was no tracer light.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 7:30 am, thursday 09/13/2007. my shift had just started. i was making the rounds touching base with my employees. i was outside taking to one of my operators. after going over a few things that we needed to cover, the operator told me to take a look at those lights in the sky. what i saw was two very bright, silver circular objests, side by side. they looked like a pair of head lights. this direction was to the wsw. we both watch the ojects moving in a ne direction. they were moving quite rapidly. as we watched the ojects move, we both then noticed another object in the sky. the same color and shape. this object appeared to by stationary. the other two objects got closer and formed an arrowhead or triangle shape and then all three moved at the same speed and direction. as we continued to watch, we then noticed approximately four to five additional objects appear. once again, same color and shape. i then called out to two other employees working in the next building to come out over here and take a look at this. now the four of us were watching these objects. we kept asking one another what do you think theses can be? we were all quite amazed. we asked one another and tried to rationalize about the possibilities of what they could be. then one of the people who i called out from the other building shouted what the xxxx! look over here as he pointed to the sw. we could not believe what we then saw. approximately 30 to maybe 40 more of these objects of the same type of shape and color. we all actually became shocked. that's probably the best way to descride it. we began to see a few more co workers passing by on their fork lits and called them outside to take a look. now, during this time  a total of seven people, including myself witnessed these objects. they were all moving to the ne. we all kept saying out load what to you think it can be? do you believe this? do you guys actaully see this stuff? after approximately 15 minutes or so they began to move away and disappear. the sun raising from the east also made watching their movements more and more difficult. midway airport is just a couple of miles away and were saw planes in the area. the pilots had to have seen these objects. we could not capture any videos or photos as no one anything to use. it was rather amazing. all of us talked about it throughout the day telling our co workers.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A total of seven people observed bright silver, circular objects. a total of 30+ objects were observed flying from sw to the ne.

content.detailedDescription:

corner of bennett mcalpine road bellingham, wa usa describe briefly the physical appearance of the object(s):   150 to 200 yards across, gray color with a communication type of disk attached to the bottom of it. no lights or noise just hovering there about 100 feet off the ground just under the fog cover.  describe briefly the location of your sighting:  hovering about 100 feet off the ground above a house next door to the car body shop there, showing only half of it���s self (lower half)  while the other half was hidden up in the fog cover.  where were you & what were you doing at the time?:     i was driving to the store in my car to get a pack of cigarettes on bennett street facing east when i say it on my left what made you first notice the object?:   first i noticed that all the lights were out all a long the street in that block and the fog was swirling around the top of this house and then i saw it just above the house.  what did you think the object was when you first saw it?:    i thought it was a military disc or hovering craft, i didn���t know what to think maybe a flying saucer or something. after thinking about it i thought it might be a military craft due to the fact that it had a satellite dish under the bottom of it and it looked a dull gray color like the ships i sailed on during my seaman days.  describe your reaction/action during and after the sighting:  i never been so scared in my life. i shook and trembled and wanted to get out of my car and run away, and for the past two years i feared to report it due to fear of having the military and government come to my house a lock me and my family up.  describe the object and its actions: i only saw the lower half of the ship due to the fog being so low. it was gray painted about 150 to 200 feet across from edge to edge. it had a satellite dish and some kind of crimson red light that i could hardly see shining down from the center bottom of the craft.  how did you lose sight of the object?:  i don���t know because i drove off before it left. i set there and watched it for a few minutes and being so scared of what would happen to me if they found out that i saw them i didn���t content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work in los angeles (west)and leaving the
110 to drive home to east pasadena. driving along arroyo parkway
i made a right turn on fillmore ave, close to california avenue that
i normally take to go home to del mar avenue.

as i waited for traffic to allow me to prceed leaving fillmore ave onto marengo ave, i suddenly felt like "looking up" and could hardly contain myself what was to come next.

there it was. right away i realized as i noticed it's spinning action, that it cannot have been anything else but a circular ufo. it was a silver circular craft having many lights around the
largest diameter point and had a small little dome point in it's roof center - different from a bell shaped craft.

the distance between myself and the craft was approximately the same as a helicopter flies doing
police type surveillance as it spot lights down.

the craft was at least 1 football field large, if not 2 fields. it was
it's size that i was impressed with.It was spinning
itself as it flew off in normal aircraft type of speed, it was as if it and it's crew wanted to be seen since they didn't just "whizz off".

they were in almost direct distance overhead to cal tech, as if they had 
stopped by there for geological data collection.

my cellphone has no camera and traffic was far too busy still to step outside of my car and point up. i would gladly had done so if traffic flow would have allowed for that. i am truly sorry that i could not do so.
content.summary: Was driving home on arroyo parkway, turning r on fillmore i looked up and saw the craft

content.detailedDescription: On april 13, 2006, i was walking around ely, nevada, filming with a sony camcorder, some old houses from gold-rush (and copper and silver)days. it was 4:10:31 in the afternoon.  now, september, 2007, i just recently had my computer repaired and so had begun to go through my tapes, looking at them for the first time. i thought that i saw something move above one of the houses so i saved it to pictures and titled it "look for ufo". when i enlarged it, i clearly saw one of the discs, so i went back to that tape and downloaded frame-by-frame six photos in sequence. they are all from the same second in time.  the camera temporarily malfunctioned after the last photo but then abruptly started filming again at another location.     several years prior, in 1993, while my husband, dog and i were exploring the lucky boy pass area near hawthorne, nevada, we saw an object that looked "just like" one of these. we were trying to find an elusive whirring sound, when suddenly directly above us was a stainless steel looking object. it didn't seem to come, it was just there. looking straight up at it, approximately 30 feet, there didn't appear to be any nuts, bolts, seams or any marks whatsoever.  i could clearly see the small trees that surrounded us reflected on the shiny bottom side. next we knew, it was gone. it didn't seem to leave, but it was gone. i asked my husband, "what was that??!!" and he replied,like a zombie, in a monotone "it's just an airplane".  our beautiful female german shepherd would go hide afterwards, whenever we pointed up at the sky. the disc appeared to be about 3 feet across.
content.summary: Two fast moving silver fliers over downtown ely, nv

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting on the 7th floor of our balcony looking out into the ocean enjoying the summer breeze.  it was a clear night with only a few whispy clouds.

we saw a bright white light appear in the sky and it seemed not to move.  we at first thought it might be a helicopter or airplane headed straight for us, explaining the lack of perceived movement.  it was very bright white, like a star.  then, suddenly, it headed to the south for a short distance, at a high rate of speed, and the light remained visible at its fullest brightness, and it disappeared.

then, about 2 minutes later, another light, about the same elevation, appeared a short distance to the north of the previous sighting.  it wasn't as bright, but, then it just went away as quickly as it appeared.  it did not give us the impression of 'movement'.

we thought we might should call the coast guard, but, felt silly and did not do so.  we knew that if it was a flare it would orginate from the water, head up, and arch over at a slow speed.  this didn't match what we thought would be a flare.

i'm also aware of a story from woods hole institue back in early 2000 regarding the continental shelf slipping off the coast of nc/sc.  i'm wondering if that is releasing sediment gas and it is somehow igniting. 

seems that since the airforce base is so close, they would either have their own reports from their control towers or pilots, or, maybe they are just testing a new aircraft.

we were stunned at what we had just witnessed, and still today, gives us both a chill.  

i am an educated it professional, and my sister is an speech language professional.

we went inside to get our spouses, and we sat on the balcony with the video camera turned on for another hour but didn't see anything further.

we had let this slip our mind until we heard of other sightings that folks were having there and thought we should add our story.
content.summary: Small white light in sky, odd manuvers/speed

content.detailedDescription: I decided to reveal my collection of photos for professionals such as your group to look at and give your oppinion on what things i should do and were my research possibly go from here. i have the ability to contact ufo's telepathicly, and also can communicate with them to some degree.  i aam what you might say a true contactee.  i have over 20,000 photos and some videos, and some photos of alians .  if you send a investigator i can call them and he can see for him or her self, please don't think i'am dilusional or mental, if you want the real thing just give me a call and will make arrangements. also i have lots of witnesses to my abilities.                                                                                                                                                               sincerly robert bingham
content.summary: Thousands of sightings to much to descibe on this short space
